languages.text: "Прощение даровано, технобрат. Да не оскудеет заряд благости Омниссии в батареях преданных".

traits.locale_text: "Мудрое слово твое, магос Паскаль, рассеивает заряд моего гнева. Д-дозволяю спросить".

languages.text: "Absolution granted, tech-brother. May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful."
languages.original_text: "Прощение даровано, технобрат. Да не оскудеет заряд благости Омниссии в батареях преданных".

languages.text: "Absolution erteilt, Tech-Bruder. Möge die Ladung der Gnade des Omnissiah in den Batterien der Gläubigen Bestand haben."
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted, tech-brother. May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Absolution erteilt, Tech-Bruder. Möge die Ladung der Gnade des Omnissiah in den Batterien der Gläubigen Bestand haben."

languages.text: « Absolution accordée, ô technofrère. Que le courant de la grâce de l'Omnimessie circule à jamais dans les batteries des fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted, tech-brother. May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: « Absolution accordée, ô technofrère. Que le courant de la grâce de l'Omnimessie circule à jamais dans les batteries des fidèles. »

languages.text: “准予赦免，技术兄弟。愿欧姆尼塞亚的恩典在虔诚之人的蓄电池中永存不灭。”
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted, tech-brother. May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: “准予赦免，技术兄弟。愿欧姆尼塞亚的恩典在虔诚之人的蓄电池中永存不灭。”

languages.text: 「赦しを与える。万機神の恩寵たる電荷が、忠実なる者のバッテリーに長く残らんことを」
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted, tech-brother. May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: 「赦しを与える。万機神の恩寵たる電荷が、忠実なる者のバッテリーに長く残らんことを」

languages.text: «Absolución concedida, tecnohermano. Que la carga de la gracia del Omnissiah persista en las baterías de los fieles».
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted, tech-brother. May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: «Absolución concedida, tecnohermano. Que la carga de la gracia del Omnissiah persista en las baterías de los fieles».

languages.text: "Af bahşedildi tekno kardeşim. Hermesih'in lütfuyla bezeli o mukaddes yük, inançlıların bataryalarında ebediyen hüküm sürsün."
languages.original_text: "Absolution granted, tech-brother. May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Af bahşedildi tekno kardeşim. Hermesih'in lütfuyla bezeliş o mukaddes yük, inançlıların bataryalarında ebediyen hüküm sürsün."
